sourcesContent:
General Terms and Conditions (GTC)

Please read the "General Terms and Conditions (GTC)" below completely, as they differ greatly from the GTCs that still exist today. We have to assume that you have read the terms and conditions completely and understood them. So far, we have only translated these terms and conditions into German, as this is our contractual language which we use.

Please accept the terms and conditions
Below you can go to the settings after confirming the terms and conditions, which still have to be specified so that our platform can function properly.
import { IUser } from './../entities/user/user.model'; import { GeneralService } from 'app/general.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-agb', templateUrl: './agb.component.html', styleUrls: ['./agb.component.scss'], }) export class AgbComponent implements OnInit { pdfSrc = 'https://createyourevent.org/content/pdf/AGB.pdf'; user: IUser; constructor(private generalService: GeneralService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.generalService.findWidthAuthorities().subscribe(u => { this.user = u.body; }); } switchAGB(): void { this.generalService.updateAGBTrue(this.user.id).subscribe(); } }
